name: Safomar Aviation Operations (Pty) Ltd
about: Safomar Aviation Operations (Pty) Ltd, a South African Civil Aviation Authority (SACAA) certified Aviation Training Organisation (ATO 0385), is dedicated to providing superior aviation training. Established as part of the Safomar Group, which has been a leading figure in the aviation sector since 1987, SAO focuses on delivering high-quality flight training and aviation services. The school offers comprehensive training programs, including the Private Pilot Licence, and assists students in all aspects of their aviation journey, from initial flight medical bookings to advanced training. With a commitment to customer-centric service and a team of dedicated professionals, SAO ensures that students receive the best possible education and support in their pursuit of a career in aviation. SAO is your trusted partner in achieving aviation excellence.
